item.title: arXiv Paper Downloader
item.description: This Python program can automatically download papers from arXiv based on specific keywords (multiple keywords are supported), the range of publication year-month, and the desired number of papers to download. Please note that this script currently supports only the Chrome browser. [Download here (GitHub)] Feature Highlights Keywords Search: Conducts paper searches based on keywords provided by the user, supporting multiple keyword entries. Paper Upload Date Range Setting: Users can specify the year-month range for the paper uploaded date they wish to search.
